DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy and Safety from a high-dosed sublingual grass pollen preparation
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety From a High-dosed Sublingual Grass Pollen Preparation
DOC.criteria: Allergic rhinoconjunctivitis attributable to grass pollen Positive SPT Positive EAST Positive provocation Test Serious chronic disease other perennial allergies
DOC.keyword: IgE-mediated Allergic Disease attributed to grass pollen
